name: InseparAbel
description:
You and your twin are conjoined. Cain and Abel. Tweedledee and Tweedledum. Or is it Stu and Pid? 

Made for UCSC Alumni Summer Jam 3, this is the debut game of Epistemological Thong Productions: Los Tres Putas (which some know simply as Tripple Cud, or the Living Room Whores). 

Epistemological Thong Productions; Los Tres Putas: 
Noah Panec — Art Director 
Cassidy Parong — Text Director 
Deanna "Lav" Davidson — Music Director 

Sexless Angel Mantis Babies: RDahans Buy your own Babies — two pair, because everyone needs a friend

*RDahans is in no way affiliated with Epistemological Thong Productions. We are just fans of their work.
